methods.name: createFirmwareUpdateOperation
methods.rawdescription: Prepares a firmware update operation for given device and the selected repository binary, and sends it to the device.
methods.description: Prepares a firmware update operation for given device and the selected repository binary, and sends it to the device.

jsdoctags.comment: The device which the operation should be prepared for and sent to.
The selected repository binary option.

methods.name: createObservedOperation
methods.rawdescription:
Creates the operation and returns an observable to track its progress.
Fails the observable when the operation returns FAILED status.
Completes the observable when the operation returns SUCCESSFUL status.
methods.description: Creates the operation and returns an observable to track its progress. Fails the observable when the operation returns FAILED status. Completes the observable when the operation returns SUCCESSFUL status.

jsdoctags.comment: The operation to create and track.

methods.name: createSoftwareUpdateOperation
methods.rawdescription: Prepares a software update operation for given device and the list of changes, and sends it to the device.
methods.description: Prepares a software update operation for given device and the list of changes, and sends it to the device.

jsdoctags.comment: The device which the operation should be prepared for and sent to.
The list of software changes which should be applied.

methods.name: createTextBasedConfigurationReloadOperation

Prepares a configuration download operation for given device and its current configuration.
Supports c8y_SendConfiguration operation.
methods.description: Prepares a configuration download operation for given device and its current configuration. Supports c8y_SendConfiguration operation.

jsdoctags.comment: The device for which operation should be prepared.

methods.name: createTextBasedConfigurationUpdateOperation
methods.rawdescription:
Prepares a configuration update operation for the given device.
Supports c8y_Configuration operation.
methods.description: Prepares a configuration update operation for the given device. Supports c8y_Configuration operation.

jsdoctags.comment: The device for which operation should be prepared.

methods.description: Fetches all items from the list starting with the provided page.

methods.name: getBinaryFile
methods.rawdescription:
Returns a binary object as File.
- **allowExternal** - `boolean` - allows downloading external binary file
methods.description:
Returns a binary object as File.

  • allowExternal - boolean - allows downloading external binary file

jsdoctags.comment: The URL to find binary

The object with additional options:

  • allowExternal - boolean - allows downloading external binary file

methods.name: getBinaryText
methods.rawdescription:
Returns a binary object as text.
- **allowExternal** - `boolean` - allows downloading external binary file
- **noAlerts** - `boolean` - do not display an alert message; defaults to `false`
methods.description:
Returns a binary object as text.

  • allowExternal - boolean - allows downloading external binary file
  • noAlerts - boolean - do not display an alert message; defaults to false

jsdoctags.comment: The URL to find binary

The object with additional options:

  • allowExternal - boolean - allows downloading external binary file
  • noAlerts - boolean - do not display an alert message; defaults to false

methods.rawdescription:
Generates an inventory query object which can be used to find configuration repository entries
matching the type of provided device and specified configuration type.

Prepares a firmware update operation for given device and selected version.
Supports c8y_Firmware operation.

methods.name: getFirstMatchingOperation
methods.rawdescription:
Iterates over the list of filters and queries the operations.
If a query returns at least one operation, the first one will be returned.
Otherwise the next query will be performed.
If none of the queries returns any operation, null will be returned.
methods.description: Iterates over the list of filters and queries the operations. If a query returns at least one operation, the first one will be returned. Otherwise the next query will be performed. If none of the queries returns any operation, null will be returned.

jsdoctags.comment: The list of filters for the queries.

methods.name: getLastConfigUpdateOperation
methods.rawdescription:
Gets the last configuration update operation for given device.
Looks for c8y_Configuration and c8y_SendConfiguration operations.
methods.description: Gets the last configuration update operation for given device. Looks for c8y_Configuration and c8y_SendConfiguration operations.

jsdoctags.comment: The ID of the device to find an operation for.

methods.name: getLastFirmwareUpdateOperation
methods.rawdescription:
Gets the last firmware update operation for given device.
Looks for c8y_Firmware operations.
methods.description: Gets the last firmware update operation for given device. Looks for c8y_Firmware operations.

jsdoctags.comment: The ID of the device to find an operation for.

methods.name: getLastSoftwareUpdateOperation
methods.rawdescription:
Gets the last software update operation for given device.
Looks for c8y_SoftwareUpdate, c8y_SoftwareList, or c8y_Software operations.
methods.description: Gets the last software update operation for given device. Looks for c8y_SoftwareUpdate, c8y_SoftwareList, or c8y_Software operations.

jsdoctags.comment: The ID of the device to find an operation for.

methods.name: getLatestConfigurationEvent

methods.description: Gets a single event with latest creationTime for the given device Id and event type.

Event type.

methods.name: getLatestMatchingOperation
methods.rawdescription:
Iterates over the list of filters and queries the operations.
It compares the operations retrieved by the queries by 'creationTime'
and return the latest one.
If none of the queries returns any operation, null will be returned.
methods.description: Iterates over the list of filters and queries the operations. It compares the operations retrieved by the queries by 'creationTime' and return the latest one. If none of the queries returns any operation, null will be returned.

jsdoctags.comment: The list of filters for the queries.

Generates an inventory query object which can be used to find
repository entries matching the predefined software types provided in the device.

Returned operation type depends on device's supported operations.
Supports c8y_SoftwareUpdate, c8y_SoftwareList, and c8y_Software operations.

methods.name: listAllVersions
methods.rawdescription:
Lists all versions (base and patch ones) of given top level entry.
Versions are ordered by creation time (assuming the earlier created, the older the version).
methods.description: Lists all versions (base and patch ones) of given top level entry. Versions are ordered by creation time (assuming the earlier created, the older the version).

jsdoctags.comment: Top level repository entry.
Additional query params.

methods.name: listBaseVersionAndPatches
methods.rawdescription:
Lists patch versions of given base version under the entry including the base version.
Versions are ordered by creation time (assuming the earlier created, the older the version).
In terms of legacy base version the entry gets transformed to fit the needed data model.
methods.description: Lists patch versions of given base version under the entry including the base version. Versions are ordered by creation time (assuming the earlier created, the older the version). In terms of legacy base version the entry gets transformed to fit the needed data model.

jsdoctags.comment: Top level repository entry.
Base version.

methods.rawdescription:
Lists base versions of given top level entry.
Versions are ordered by creation time (assuming the earlier created, the older the version).

methods.name: listPatchVersions

Lists patch versions of given base version under the entry.

methods.name: observeOperation
methods.rawdescription:
Returns an observable to track progress of given operation.
Fails the observable when the operation returns FAILED status.
Completes the observable when the operation returns SUCCESSFUL status.
